ygData.subject: Re: Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: The Quest itself is still up and running, however, the price returned from the sale of the drum is like 2 copper or womething outrageous like that... also I
ygData.messageBody:
The Quest itself is still up and running, however, the price returned from the
sale of the drum is like 2 copper or womething outrageous like that... also I
believe spiderling silk prices have been upped so that the quest is no longer
profitable outside of exp.
Penaden

Talies the Wanderer wrote:

> From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
>
> At 07:43 AM 7/2/99 -0500, you wrote:
> >From: "Codo the Mysterious" <codo@...>
> >
> >The nice quest for low level bards is the Spider Silk Quest in Kelethin. For
> >turning in four Spiderling Silk to the GuildMistress there, you get some
> >cash (I forget how much, not a whole lot), faction, and a free drum.
>
> I thought the "Drums-to-gold" quest had been disabled?
>
> Talies the Wanderer
